name: Boundless Skies
description: The scale of life goes beyond the world.
effect: Devotees of the Cosmic Beings may call upon 'Boundless Skies' once per quest as a bonus action during their combat turn, allowing them to roll 4d6 of Typeless damage. This is not affected by defenses, and the user must expend a Will point. At Luminary, damage dice is increased by 1. At Paragon, it is again increased by 1.
